message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/2011Athens 

Ir a Cursos
Titulo
: Ontologies, Semantic Web, and Linked Data
Objetivo
: The general objective is to provide students with a sound grounding of scientific, methodological and technological fundamentals in the Semantic Web domain that will be later used to build applications that can integrate, combine and infer heterogeneous and distributed information.
Temario y organización
:
[1]
Aula
: 6302
Profesores
: Mari Carmen, Raúl G., Lupe, Boris, Mikel, Jorge, Luis

Lingüística: Elena, Lupe
RDF, SPARQL: Raul G., Oscar
OWL: Mikel, Raul G., Oscar
LD: Boris, Luis
